title: Microsoft Research reveals Rho-alpha vision-language-action model for robots
description:
The Rho-alpha model incorporates sensor modalities such as tactile feedback and is trained with human guidance, says Microsoft.

The post Microsoft Research reveals Rho-alpha vision-language-action model for robots appeared first on The Robot Report.
